## Our Partnership Philosophy

At chen.ist Academy, we believe that meaningful educational experiences emerge from collaborative efforts between industry, academia, and community organizations. Our partnerships are designed to:

- Enhance the quality and relevance of our educational offerings
- Create pathways for learners to connect with industry opportunities
- Develop innovative approaches to technology education
- Support community initiatives and technological advancement

        <script>
          // Function to handle theme changes
          function updateTheme() {
            const isDarkMode = window.matchMedia && window.matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme: dark)').matches;
            const lightLogo = document.querySelector('.light-mode-logo');
            const darkLogo = document.querySelector('.dark-mode-logo');
            
            if (isDarkMode) {
              lightLogo.style.display = 'none';
              darkLogo.style.display = 'block';
            } else {
              lightLogo.style.display = 'block';
              darkLogo.style.display = 'none';
            }
          }
          
          // Run on page load
          updateTheme();
          
          // Listen for theme changes
          window.matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme: dark)').addEventListener('change', updateTheme);
        </script>
      </div>

## Become a Partner

We're always open to new partnership opportunities that align with our mission of providing high-quality, practical technology education.

### Why Partner With Us?

- Access to a community of motivated, skilled technology learners
- Opportunity to influence curriculum and educational approaches
- Visibility among our network of professionals and students
- Collaborative projects that address real-world challenges
- Support for corporate social responsibility initiatives
